jeus.management.j2ee

Interface WebModuleMBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEDeployedObjectMBean, jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEManagedObjectMBean, jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEModuleMBean, jeus.management.j2ee.StateManageable, jeus.management.j2ee.StatisticsProvider

    @Description(value="\uc11c\ubc84\uc5d0 \ub514\ud50c\ub85c\uc774 \ub418\uc5b4\uc788\ub294 \uc6f9\ubaa8\ub4c8\uc744 \ub098\ud0c0\ub0b8\ub2e4.\uc774 \uc6f9\ubaa8\ub4c8\uc774 \uac00\uc9c0\uace0 \uc788\ub294 \uc11c\ube14\ub9bf \ucef4\ud3ec\ub10c\ud2b8\ub4e4\uc5d0 \ub300\ud55c \uc815\ubcf4 \uc81c\uacf5 \ubc0f \ucee8\ud14d\uc2a4\ud2b8\uc5d0 \ub300\ud55c \uc81c\uc5b4\uc640 \uac01 \uc11c\ube14\ub9bf\uc5d0 \ub300\ud55c \uc81c\uc5b4 \uae30\ub2a5\uc744 \uc81c\uacf5\ud55c\ub2e4.")
public interface WebModuleMBean
extends jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEModuleMBean, jeus.management.j2ee.StatisticsProvider, jeus.management.j2ee.StateManageable
    서버에 디플로이 되어있는 웹모듈을 나타낸다.

    이 웹모듈이 가지고 있는 서블릿 컴포넌트들에 대한 정보 제공 및 이 웹모듈의 컨텍스트에 대한 제어와 각 서블릿에 대한 제어 기능을 제공한다.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String[] parentKeyMap
